thread.section_title: About.com Little Rock: Most Popular Articles
thread.title: Haunted Houses and Pumpkin Patches in Arkansas
thread.title_full: Haunted Houses and Pumpkin Patches in Arkansas

title: Haunted Houses and Pumpkin Patches in Arkansas
text:
1 Scimitar Circle (South University at Forbing Road)501-565-5992 
EMOBA's Haunted Cathedral (Little Rock) KFOctober 14-31 (closed 17,19, 23)- 7:30-9:30 p.m. Weeknights, 7:30 to midnight Friday and Saturday1208 Louisiana AvenueThis Haunted House has a lot of animatronics, which is why I call it kid-friendly. It used to be a really tame haunted house, but they upped their game a little. It may just be too scary for very small kids (but probably not, and the actors seemed aware of not being to scary for the little ones). Admission is $15 ($20 on Halloween). Opens at 7:30 p.m. 
September 29-30, October 1, 6-8, 13-15, 18-22, 24-315503 Scott Hamilton501-804-1782They say they have indoor blood pools, and a red meat buffet. Opens at 7 p.m. Admission $15, but they have speed passes for $20. There are discount dates available and some giveaways on their Facebook page. 
September 30, October 1, 6-8, 13-31, November 16016 Crystal Hill Rd.501-400-3116This is a maze type haunted house with over 15,000 square feet of horror with 30 scenes. They have live actors. It's not really kid friendly, but not very scary. If you have an older kid, they will probably be ok. Admission is $15. 
September 30, October 1, 7-8, 13-15 20-23, 26-31150 Highway 286 East501-472-2325Haunted house has a mixture of actors, animatronics and scenery. From 7 p.m. to 12 a.m. Admission $12. Very good haunted house. One of the best in Arkansas, especially for the price. 
Old Haunted Warehouse (Little Rock) * 3400 Brown StreetNov 30, Oct 1-2,7-9,14-16,21-23,28-31.The Old Haunted Warehouse is entering its sixth season of terror. Featuring new horrific scenes and psychopathic fiends, we will take you on a heart-pounding trip through a twisted world populated by the followers and victims of Central Arkansas' most nefarious serial killers. Every Fri & Sat from 8 p.m. to 11:30 p.m., Sundays and October 27 from 8 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. and Oct 27, Oct30, 31 from 8 p.m. until everyone clears out. Admission is $15, $20 on the 31st, $2 off for military & emergency response personnel (valid until oct 29 w/ID). Haunted Houses: Around Arkansas (* are faves)Magic Screams: Halloween at Magic Springs (Hot Springs) Magic Springs and Crystal FallsWeekends October 8-30Visit the spooky haunted houses, walk the scary trail and take a spin on the rides. For young goblins, enjoy a scare-free zone for pumpkin painting, family Halloween themed movies and more. 501-318-5309. Admission: $29.99 one-day admission. 
Open every Friday and Saturday in October and the week of Halloween10194 Heber Springs Road, across from gas station501-887-6543.They've turned this into a 3d haunted attraction this year, and you have to wear 3d glasses apparently. They have a new indoor waiting room and have redone the entire attraction. They are open from 7 to 11 p.m. Admission $10, and benefits the Sturge-Weber Foundation
